title: 1.15.2自定义附魔不行
author: yuansen987
txt_content:
网上的大部分指令都试过。要不说找不到物品要不就是给的是一个没有附魔的普通工具急着弄氪金稿
求告诉真正的1.15.2的指令

replies.author: yuansen987
replies.txt_content:
我想弄一个效率X 时运V 无线耐久的稿子
求给指令
网上的基本都试了根本不行

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: ETW_Derp
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ETW_Derp 于 2020-4-13 17:26 编辑 
/give @p minecraft:diamond_pickaxe{Unbreakable:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fortune",lvl:5},{id:"minecraft:efficiency",lvl:10}]} 1复制代码
效果：




TIM截图20200413163240.png (35.95 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-4-13 16:32 上传






请附上你的错误信息，截图发一下。
注意命令最后有一个“ 1”，不要漏了他。@yuansen987

replies.author: ljyys
replies.txt_content:
在命令方块内输入
/give @p minecraft:diamond_pickaxe{Unbreakable:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:efficiency",lvl:10},{id:"minecraft:fortune",lvl:5}]} 1
求最佳

replies.author: 破损的鞘翅
replies.txt_content: 打开你的游戏，然后按一下键盘上的f3键，然后按一下f2，把截屏得到的图片发到论坛上来看一下。

replies.author: Xu__
replies.txt_content: 命令方块使用：/give @p minecraft:diamond_pickaxe 1 9223372036854775807 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,Amount:66,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.attackDamage",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:0.1,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.attackSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:10,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.maxHealth",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:1,Amount:1,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.movementSpeed",Name:"CBC"},{Operation:0,Amount:20,UUIDLeast:1L,UUIDMost:1L,Slot:mainhand,AttributeName:"generic.reachDistance",Name:"CBC"}],display:{Name:"真·创世·镐",Lore:["词镐，赐予汝等诛神之力…"]},Unbreakable:1,ench:[{id:32,lvl:10},{id:35,lvl:5}]}

replies.author: johnny0719
replies.txt_content: give @p minecraft:diamond_pickaxe{Unbreakable:1,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:efficiency",lvl:10},{id:"minecraft:fortune",lvl:5}]} 这个没问题，记得别在命令方块里打打/，然后激活这个命令方块就可以了
